Error.InvalidContentsTypeForContainer: This container cannot contain contents of this type.
Error.ContainerRecursiveError: Container cannot be dragged into itself or one of its contained items.

Limited.Name: Cannot exceed default skill level by more than

Damage.Name: Damage
Damage.StMul: Multiply ST used for sw or thr damage calculation by

Tooltip.SkillLevelStrengthRequirement: {name} [{modifier} to skill level due to minimum ST requirement]
Tooltip.RetractingStock: *: Has a retracting stock. With the stock folded, the weapon's stats change to Bulk {bulk}, Accuracy {accuracy}, Recoil {recoil}, and minimum ST {strength}. Folding or unfolding the stock takes one Ready maneuver.
Tooltip.ReachChangeRequiresReady: *: Changing reach requires a Ready maneuver.
Tooltip.ReloadTimeIsPerShot: i: Reload time is per shot.
Tooltip.ROFModeSecondaryProjectiles: This weapon fires {shotsCount} {shotsText} per attack and each shot releases {projectilesCount} smaller {projectilesText}.
Tooltip.ROFModeFullAutoOnly: !: This weapon can only fire on full automatic. Minimum RoF is {min}.
Tooltip.ROFModeHighCyclicControlledBursts: #: This weapon can fire in high cyclic controlled bursts, reducing Recoil to 1.
Tooltip.ParryFencing: F: Fencing weapon. When retreating, your Parry is {retreatingParry} (instead of {normalParry}). You suffer a -2 cumulative penalty for multiple parries after the first on the same turn instead of the usual -4. Flails cannot be parried by this weapon.
Tooltip.ParryUnbalanced: U: Unbalanced weapon. You cannot use it to parry if you have already used it to attack this turn (or vice-versa).
Tooltip.Recoil: First Recoil value is for shot, second is for slugs
Tooltip.StrengthRated: The weapon has a rated ST of {st}, which is used instead of the user's ST for all calculations except minimum ST.
Tooltip.StrengthMinimum: The weapon has a minimum ST of {min}. If your ST is less than this, you will suffer a -1 to weapon skill per point of ST you lack and lose one extra FP at the end of any fight that lasts long enough to cost FP.
Tooltip.StrengthBipodReducedST: B: Has an attached bipod. When used from a prone position, reduces the ST requirement to {st} and treats the attack as braced (add +1 to Accuracy).
Tooltip.StrengthBipodNoReducedST: B: Has an attached bipod. When used from a prone position, treats the attack as braced (add +1 to Accuracy).
Tooltip.StrengthMounted: M: Mounted. Ignore listed ST and Bulk when firing from its mount. Takes at least 3 Ready maneuvers to unmount or remount the weapon.
Tooltip.StrengthMusketRest: R: Uses a Musket Rest. Any aimed shot fired while stationary and standing up is automatically braced (add +1 to Accuracy).
Tooltip.StrengthTwoHandedUnready: â¡: Requires two hands and becomes unready after you attack with it. If you have at least ST {st15}, you can used it two-handed without it becoming unready. If you have at least ST {st3}, you can use it one-handed with no readiness penalty.
Tooltip.StrengthTwoHanded: â : Requires two hands. If you have at least ST {st15}, you can use it one-handed, but it becomes unready after you attack with it. If you have at least ST {st2}, you can use it one-handed with no readiness penalty.

SpellRitual.LessThan10: Ritual: need both hands and feet free and must speak; Time: 2x
SpellRitual.LessThan15: Ritual: speak quietly and make a gesture
SpellRitual.LessThan20: Ritual: speak a word or two OR make a small gesture{time}
SpellRitual.Time: ; Time: x1/{number}, rounded up, min 1 sec

RitualMagic.College: Must be assigned to a college

Messages.ModifierEnabledTooltip: Whether this modifier is enabled. Modifiers that are not enabled do not apply any features they may normally contribute.
Messages.ContainerMaxDepth: Containers cannot be nested more than {depth} levels deep.

compendium_browser.title: Compendium Browser
compendium_browser.failed_to_buy_item_with_some_characters: Could not purchase {item} with some of the selected actor(s).
compendium_browser.hint: Use the tabs above to select a library.

sources.delete_all_info: All compendium documents will become browseable, including those with empty sources.
sources.delete_all_question: Are you sure you want to reset all settings for included sources?

automatic_unready.name: Automatic Unready
automatic_unready.hint: Automatically unready appropraitely marked weapons when attacking or parrying.

show_token_modifiers.name: Show Token Modifiers
show_token_modifiers.hint: Enable the Token Effect Modifiers pop-up window.

show_import_button.name: Show Import Button
show_import_button.hint: Toggle whether the "Import" button is displayed on character sheet headers.

basic_set_pdfs.name: Basic Set PDFs
basic_set_pdfs.hint: Select Combined or Separate and use the associated PDF codes when configuring PDFs. Note: If you select Separate, the Basic Set Campaigns PDF should open up to page 340 during the PDF test.

server_side_file_dialog.name: Use Server-Side File Dialog
server_side_file_dialog.hint: When enabled, file prompts (for character sheet uploads, etc.) will use the FoundryVTT file dialog, which searches through files on the Foundry server. When disabled, file prompts will search the user's local machine.

portrait_path.name: Default Portrait Path
portrait_path.hint: Choose where character portraits are stored (in the global Foundry User Data directory, or the local world directory).

portrait_overwrite.name: Overwrite Portraits
portrait_overwrite.hint: Choose whether character portraits are overwritten on import

enable_token_modifier_window.name: Enable Token Modifier Window
enable_token_modifier_window.hint: Enable the Token Modifier Window, which shows modifiers related to selected and targeted tokens

ssrt.name: Range Modifier Formula
ssrt.hint: Sets the formula used to calculate range penalties.

roll_formula.name: Default Roll-Against Formula
roll_formula.hint: Set the die roll performed when rolling against a Skill, Attribute, etc.

import_body_plan.name: Legacy: Import Body Plan
import_body_plan.hint: Choose whether to overwrite character body plans for Legacy Characters.

choices.no: Do not overwrite with imported body plan
choices.ask: Ask before overwriting with imported body plan

import_name.name: Legacy: Import Name
import_name.hint: Choose whether the character's name is overwritten on import. This is useful if the character name used in GCS/GCA is different from that used in Foundry.

import_hp_fp.name: Legacy: Import HP & FP
import_hp_fp.hint: Choose whether to overwrite HP & FP when importing Legacy Characters.

choices.no: Do not overwrite with imported HP & FP
choices.ask: Ask before overwriting with imported HP & FP

initiative_formula.name: Initiative Formula
initiative_formula.hint: Sets formula to roll to decide on combat turn order

colors.hint: Colors used throughout the GURPS Game Aid.

roll_modifiers.name: Custom Modifiers

default_damage_location.name: Default Damage Location
default_damage_location.hint: Set the default hit location used to apply damage.

compendium_browser_packs.name: Compendium Browser Packs
compendium_browser_packs.hint: Choose which packs are included in the compendium browser.

base_books.name: Base Rulebooks
base_books.hint: Choose which base rulebooks are used for in-built references

maneuver_detail.name: Maneuver Detail
maneuver_detail.hint: Determines the level of maneuver detail visible to players and the GM.

world_schema_version.name: World Schema Version
world_schema_version.hint: Records the schema version for documents in the GURPS system (don't modify this unless you know what you are doing).
